name: Verify if Ireland Is selected, PPS field to be displayed and NI field to be hidden
Verify if UK is selected, NI field is to remain to be filled out
Verify if Both is selected, PPS and NI fields are to be displayed
Verify that the page cannot be saved without these fields being filled out, mandatory field
Verify that when logged in as an Agency User PPS column is populated if the information was inputted when the worker was created
Verify that when logged in as an Agency User NI column is populated if the information was inputted when the worker was created
Verify that when logged in as an Agency User, the Worker likely to work in UK/Ireland question is to appear when editing/adding a worker
Verify that the page cannot be saved without these fields being filled out, mandatory field
Verify if Ireland Is selected, PPS field to be displayed and NI field to be hidden
Verify if UK is selected, NI field is to remain to be filled out
Verify if Both is selected, PPS and NI fields are to be displayed
Verify that there is a currency dropdown on the Agency BACS Export.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven,  with View invoices or Manage invoices permission.
When:
  • On the invoices , Agency BACS export page
Then:
  • The advanced filters should have an option for currency.
  • The currency field should be a dropdown.
  • The default value of the field when the page loads should be GBP.

name: Verify that there is a currency Column on the Agency BACS Export
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven,  with View invoices or Manage invoices permission.
When:
  • On the invoices , Agency BACS export page
Then:
  • The table has a column for the currency. 
  • The column should be after the branch column. 
  • The currency should be displayed as either GBP or EURO.
  • The table will default to all currencies unless the filter is used.

name: Verify that the changes to column names on the Agency BAC export.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven,  with View invoices or Manage invoices permission.
When:
  • On the invoices , Agency BACS export page
Then:
  • The column name for Account Number has been changed to : Account Number/IBAN .
  • The column name for Sort Code has been changed to : Sort Code/BIC Code .

name: Verify Changes to client setup for Multi Currency when setting up an New Client.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User. 
When:
  • On the client set up page. 
Then:
  • There will be a currency field on the Client details tab
  • The currency will be linked to the country that has been selected, and will auto populate to that field. 
  • Invoices for the client will be display the currency select on this page.

name: Verify Changes to client setup for Multi Currency when editing an existing client
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User. 
When:
  • On the client set up page. 
Then:
  • There will be a currency field on the Client details tab
  • The currency will be linked to the country that has been selected, and will auto populate to that field. 
  • When changing the currency, the new invoices generated should display in the new currency and the old one should link back to the old currency.

name: Verify if the Agency is outside of the UK Account number and sort code are not to be displayed
Verify if the Agency is outside of the UK, IBAN field is to be displayed and BIC field to be displayed
Verify if edit Is selected, on the additional details tab if the Agency is outside of the UK if the Agency is outside of the UK Account number and sort code are not to be displayed
Verify if edit Is selected, on the additional details tab if the Agency is outside of the UK, IBAN field is to be displayed and BIC field to be displayed
Verify IBAN Field is alphanumeric
Verify GB code is to be based on the country that the Agency is set to
Verify that the IBAN field character limit is 34
Verify that the BIC field is alphanumeric with a character limit of 12
Verify if a new agency branch is created, on the additional details tab if the Agency is outside of the UK, IBAN field is to be displayed and BIC field to be displayed
Verify if a new agency branch is created, on the additional details tab if the Agency is outside of the UK, IBAN field is to be displayed and BIC field to be displayed

Verify when the Bank History Button is selected, if the Agency is outside of the UK, IBAN field is to be displayed and BIC field to be displayed and Sort code and account number are not to be displayed
Verify that when logged in as an Agency User on the Rates Export Page the ERNI field has been renamed to ERNI/PRSI.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Agency User.

When: 

  • On the Rates Export Page.

Then:

  • The ERNI field has been renamed to ERNI/PRSI.

name: Verify the as a Client User the multi-currency on the VIEW time sheets page changes.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client User with Enter Timesheet Permissions.

When: 

  • On the time sheet adjustment page > time sheet table displayed 

Then:

  • The Currency Column is displayed next to the location column.

  • The Currency Column displays the relevant Currency that the client is linked to.

  • The Currency Column displays the relevant Symbol for that Currency.

  • The changes to the currency are found in the following columns: Bonus, Exp and total cost.

name: Verify the as a Client User the multi-currency on the EDIT time sheets page changes.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client User with Enter Timesheet Permissions.

When: 

  • On the time sheet adjustment page > time sheet table displayed 

Then:

  • The Currency Column is displayed next to the location column.

  • The Currency Column displays the relevant Currency that the client is linked to.

  • The Currency Column displays the relevant Symbol for that Currency.

  • The changes to the currency are found in the following columns: Bonus, Exp and total cost. 

  • When changes are made to this table the information is saved correctly.

name: Verify when exporting times sheets as a Client User the currency column is displayed.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client User with Enter Timesheet Permissions.

When: 

  • On the time sheet adjustment page > time sheet table displayed 

Then:

  • Export the report.

  • The column for currency should be included in the report.

  • There should be the correct currency symbols used in the export.

testScript:

Then:

  • The Currency Column displays the relevant Currency that the Agency is linked to.

  • The changes to the currency are found in the following columns: Bonus, Exp and total cost.

name: Verify the ERNI Tab changes to the administration page when logged in as a Neuven User.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged on as a Neuven User.

When:

  • In the administration tab > WTR, ERNI, VAT, NMV, Neuven Fee page > the ERNI tab

Then:

  • The ERNI field has been renamed to ERNI/PRSI.
  • Country dropdown is available on the page.
  • The currency field should reflect the default currency for the country selected.
  • THE ERNI exempt amount field should say ERNI/PRSI and the correct currency symbol is shown. 
  • The ERNI History Table is called ERNI/PRSI Table, 
  • The exempt amount column should display the correct currency symbol.

name: Verify the National Minimum Wage Tab changes to the administration page when logged in as a Neuven User.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged on as a Neuven User.

When:

  • In the administration tab > WTR, ERNI, VAT, NMV, Neuven Fee page > the National Minimum Wage tab

Then:

  • There is a country drop down menu on this tab. 

  • Currency symbols displayed are related to that country.

name: Verify the Neuven Fee Tab changes to the administration page when logged in as a Neuven User.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged on as a Neuven User.

When:

  • In the administration tab > WTR, ERNI, VAT, NMV, Neuven Fee page > the Neuven Fee tab.

Then:

  • Based on the client that is selected. 

  • The currency shown is the correct currency for that client and uses the correct symbols.

name: Verify if Neuven user with relevant permission can see the New page (Document type name) maintenance page in Nav menu
Verify there is Document Name Field
Verify Document Name field is a free type text box and all characters and numbers can be entered
Verify if Document Name field auto complete’s if there is a similar or same name used before
Verify if user add’s same or similar document name pop up appears to alert the user about saving duplicate document name
Verify the wording in the pop-up is user friendly
Verify the default tick box exist on the page and able to use the tick box
Verify when default is ticked document appears in default document dropdown in document maintenance page
Verify when default is not ticked document appears in the client specific document dropdown in document maintenance page
Verify the add functionality
Verify when document name is added it shows on the table below
Verify the name of the columns in the document names table
Verify when document added correct information is displayed on the table
Verify the edit functionality on the document name table
Verify the delete functionality on the document name table
Verify the delete functionality on the document name table when document name is used elsewhere in the system
Verify the search box above the document name table
Verify the page size dropdown above the document name table
Verify the pagination below the document name table
Verify all the spellings and alignment on the Document name maintenance page
Verify the user friendliness of the document name maintenance page
Verify responsiveness of the page when there is large amount of data on the page
Verify there is a expiry date applicable tick box on the default tab of the Worker document maintenance page
Verify expiry date applicable column is added to the table on default tab worker document maintenance page
Verify document name is a drop-down Default tab and is feeding correctly from the document name maintenance page
Verify Document’s can be added to the default document table
Verify ‘Click on more than one client to select multiple clients’ message is displayed above the Select client dropdown
Verify that the Client drop down allows the user to multi select clients
Verify that ‘Click on more than one group to multi-select’ message is displayed above Select job type group dropdown
Verify that the Select Job type Group allows the user to multi select
Verify that Select document dropdown documents in the default list show regardless of any clients selected
Verify that the select document drop down will be filtered based on the clicent/clients, job type group/groups selected
Verify that each combination is unique and will only appear once on the drop down list
Verify that there is a date picker for document types where expiry applicable has been ticked in the document maintenance page
Verify that the user cannot save documents without selecting an expiry date
Verify that the user cannot choose a date in the past
Verify that the allowed formats and size of documents are displayed
Verify that drag and drop and click through to choose documents to upload works successfully
Verify that once upload is clicked, the document is uploaded successfully
Verify that if upload is clicked without an expiry date selected, the error message is displayed
Verify that if document type is not selected, error message displayed
Verify that if the document does not match the specified formats required, error message displayed
Verify that if the document exceeds the specified size, error message is displayed
Verify that if a document is not added to the drop box, an error message is displayed
Verify that if a document is uploaded that already exists on the table, that the error message is displayed in a pop up box and when Yes clicked the document is replaced
Verify that the Existing employee documents table has a search box, pagnation, page numbers, page size drop down and the appropriate number of rows based on selection
Verify that a column for File Name is included on the existing employee documents table
Verify that once an agency is selected, the table with worker details is displayed
Verify that a Mandatoyr Document column is to be added to the worker details page once the + ha s been selected for a worker
Verify that if the document has been selected as mandatory in the Documents Maintenance Page, Yes is to be displayed in this column
Verify that if the document does not have mandatory selected in the Documents Maintenance Page, No is to be displayed in this column
Verify that the Verified column is to be replaced by the Expiry Date Column
